fraudPatterns.reason: Fake electricity bill scam - Creates urgency to steal money
fraudPatterns.recommendation: Check your official electricity provider app or website. Never click links in such SMS.

fraudPatterns.reason: KYC phishing attempt - Banks don't ask for KYC via SMS
fraudPatterns.recommendation: Visit your bank branch or use official bank app only.

fraudPatterns.reason: Lottery scam - You can't win what you didn't enter
fraudPatterns.recommendation: Delete this message. Never pay fees to claim prizes.

fraudPatterns.reason: Fake delivery notification to steal payment
fraudPatterns.recommendation: Check with the courier company directly using their official website.

fraudPatterns.reason: Job scam asking for registration fees
fraudPatterns.recommendation: Legitimate jobs never ask for fees upfront.
